EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_DE_Digital Transformation Forum_Q216.Reminder - English
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal Digital Transformation Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/de/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]> Hello,
We are delighted you will be joining us for the Digital Transformation Forum at Hilton Frankfurt Airport Hotel on Wednesday, 8 June!
Time: 9h00 to 16h45 {{my.My Token-English:default=Save the Date & Time}}
Location: Hilton Frankfurt Airport Hotel <[[http://www3.hilton.com/en/hotels/hesse/hilton-frankfurt-airport-FRAHAHI/maps-directions/index.html]]>
VIEW AGENDA <[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]> Don't miss the keynotes from CIO of Volkswagen, CTO of Allianz, VP Labs EMEA of Pivotal, Dr. Willms Buhse, Fraport, Freenet and many other exciting speakers and industry experts.
If you have any dietary requirements, please let Carmen know at cparfenie@outsourcedevents.com <[[mailto:cparfenie@outsourcedevents.com]]>.
We look forward to welcoming you!
The Pivotal Team
